mapper.select: select t_blog.id id,title,type_id,recommend,t_type.name typeName,update_time,published from t_blog join t_type on t_blog.type_id=t_type.id

select t_blog.id id,title,type_id,recommend,t_type.name typeName,update_time from t_blog join t_type on t_blog.type_id=t_type.id
t_type.id=#{typeId}
and t_blog.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and t_blog.recommend = true
and t_blog.published= false

select t_blog.id,title,first_picture,description,nickname,`view`,type_id,t_type.name typeName,t_blog.update_time,avatar from t_blog,t_type,t_user where t_blog.type_id=t_type.id and t_blog.user_id=t_user.id and published=true ORDER BY t_blog.id desc
select t_blog.id id,t_blog.title title FROM t_blog where t_blog.published=true ORDER BY `view` DESC limit #{size}

select t_blog.id id,title,type_id,recommend,t_type.name typeName,update_time,first_picture firstPicture,`view`,description from t_blog join t_type on t_blog.type_id=t_type.id where t_blog.published=true and t_blog.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')

select t_blog.id id,title,type_id,t_type.name typeName,t_blog.update_time,nickname,first_picture,`view`,description from t_blog,t_type,t_user where t_blog.type_id=t_type.id and t_user.id=t_blog.user_id and t_blog.type_id=#{id} and t_blog.published=true

select t_blog.id id,title,type_id,t_type.`name` typeName,t_blog.update_time,first_picture,`view`,description,nickname from t_blog,t_tag_blog,t_type,t_user where t_tag_blog.blog_id=t_blog.id and t_blog.type_id=t_type.id and t_user.id=t_blog.user_id and t_tag_blog.tag_id=#{id} and t_blog.published=true
select date_format(t_blog.update_time,'%Y')as year from t_blog where t_blog.published=true GROUP BY date_format(t_blog.update_time,'%Y')
select t_blog.id,flag,title,date_format(t_blog.update_time,'%m月%d日') as date from t_blog where date_format(t_blog.update_time,'%Y')=#{year} and t_blog.published=true order by t_blog.update_time
select count(*) from t_blog where t_blog.published=true
mapper.update: update blog.t_blog set view=view+#{num} where id = #{id}
